name: part_005
file: tmp_【 重大告知あり‼ 】#鷹嶺ルイ2周年LIVE 『ANIMAL』【3D LIVE】 [oU85vmx7jn8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Takane Lui performs 'Leo' on a stage with a pianist.
Takane Lui performs 'Chameleon' in a snow-themed stage setting.

subtitles.original: 傍に居ると決めた大事な人
subtitles.english: The precious person I decided to stay beside

subtitles.original:
君が大きくなるほどに
僕との時間は減るが道理
subtitles.english:
As you grow larger,
it's only natural our time together decreases

subtitles.original:
遠くに君の友達同士
仕方がないよなぁ
subtitles.english:
Your friends are in the distance,
it can't be helped, right?

subtitles.original:
最近つけるその香水
鼻の利く僕にとっては辛いや
subtitles.english:
That perfume you've been wearing lately
is hard on my sensitive nose

subtitles.original: 今日も帰りは遅くなるんだろうか
subtitles.english: Will you be coming home late again today?

subtitles.original:
君が居ない部屋
夢を見る
subtitles.english:
In the room where you're not here,
I dream

subtitles.original:
あの日のこと
また
subtitles.english:
About that day,
again

subtitles.original:
名前はレオ
名前呼んでよ
subtitles.english:
The name is Leo,
call my name

subtitles.original: 君がつけてくれた名前だから
subtitles.english: Because it's the name you gave me

subtitles.original:
寂しいけれど
悲しいけれど
subtitles.english:
Though it's lonely,
though it's sad

subtitles.original: 傍に居ると決めた大事な人
subtitles.english: The precious person I decided to stay beside

subtitles.original: 君が誰かと暮らすことを
subtitles.english: That you are living with someone else

subtitles.original: 伝えに帰ってきた夜に
subtitles.english: On the night you came back to tell me

subtitles.original:
撫でてくれたね
きっとお別れだね
subtitles.english:
You stroked me, didn't you?
It's surely goodbye

subtitles.original:
最後にさ
会えたから
ねえ　幸せだよ
subtitles.english:
Because we could meet at the end,
hey, I'm happy

subtitles.original:
名前はレオ
名前呼んでよ
subtitles.english:
The name is Leo,
call my name

subtitles.original: 君がつけてくれた名前だから
subtitles.english: Because it's the name you gave me

subtitles.original:
もう泣かないでよ
名前呼んでよ
subtitles.english:
Don't cry anymore,
call my name

subtitles.original: あの日より大きな手で撫でてくれた
subtitles.english: You stroked me with a hand larger than that day

subtitles.original:
名前はレオ
名前呼んでよ
subtitles.english:
The name is Leo,
call my name

subtitles.original: 君がくれた名前で良かったよ
subtitles.english: I'm glad for the name you gave me

subtitles.original:
忘れないでよ
それでいいんだよ
subtitles.english:
Don't forget,
that's enough

subtitles.original: 新しい誰かにまた名前つけて
subtitles.english: Give a name to someone new again

subtitles.original:
突き止めていたい
叶わない君の正体は
subtitles.english:
I want to track it down,
your unattainable true identity

subtitles.original:
迷宮入りの
難解なミステリー
subtitles.english:
An unsolved,
difficult mystery

subtitles.original:
心変わり　色変わり
軽やかに姿を変えたのは
subtitles.english:
The change of heart, change of color,
the one who nimbly changed form

subtitles.original: 悲しいほどの夕暮れ
subtitles.english: Was the twilight, sad to the core

subtitles.original: 僕の知らない君は誰
subtitles.english: Who are you, the one I don't know?

subtitles.original: カメレオン
subtitles.english: Chameleon

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲：常田大希
subtitles.english: Lyrics/Composition: Daiki Tsuneta

subtitles.original: 急行列車が通り過ぎた
subtitles.english: The express train passed by

subtitles.original: 寂れた駅のホームには隙間風が吹き抜け
subtitles.english: A draft blew through the deserted station platform

subtitles.original: 君の姿はどこにも見当たらなくて
subtitles.english: Your figure was nowhere to be found

subtitles.original: 時を経て通話画面に映った君は
subtitles.english:
The you who appeared on the call screen
after some time

subtitles.original: もう僕の知らない君でした
subtitles.english: Was already a you that I didn't know

subtitles.original:
幸せそうに笑うから
つられて僕も笑ってしまった
subtitles.english:
Because you laughed so happily,
I ended up laughing along too

subtitles.original: 何度でも何度でも塗り潰して
subtitles.english: Painting over it again and again

subtitles.original: 汚れた悲しみの上から白い絵の具で
subtitles.english: With white paint over the stained sadness

subtitles.original: 全てを台無しにして葬り去ってしまった夜さえ
subtitles.english:
Even the night I ruined everything
and buried it away

subtitles.original:
キャンバスは色付くから
涙にじんで見えなくても
subtitles.english:
Because the canvas takes color,
even if it's blurred by tears and hard to see
